CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 9, 1960, pg. 6, reads: "Crusade for Freedom Committee - The Crusade for Freedom Committee includes members of L'Egants Women's Club and The Emanons Club who will present the Rev. Ralph Abernathy at a civil rights rally on April 22 at Soldiers and Sailors Memorial at 8 P.M. Left to right :Eric Springer, public relations chairman; Robert Ruffin, Emanons' president; Joan Bolden, publicity chairman; Viviane Swain, Carrie Washington, L'Egants' president; Leon Haley, coordinator; Ann Perkins and Richard Jefferson. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of L'Egants and Emanons Club members, from left: Eric Springer, Robert Ruffin, Joan Bolden, Viviane Swain, Carrie Washington, Leon Haley, Ann Perkins, and Richard Jefferson, gathered around coffee table in living room for Crusade for Freedom committee meeting
